alert.note: Alert for Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 3:41PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick and eastern Horry Counties through 415 PM EST... At 341 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a showers producing strong winds near Little River Entrance, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Cherry Grove Inlet, Little River, Little River Entrance, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Civie Town, Grissettown, Seaside, Russtown and Cherry Grove Beach. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
